title: Print contract terms
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to print a contract or its terms
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'print' on a contract
custom_expected:
THEN they will be given the option to print the contract or it's terms
IF the user chooses to print the terms of the contract, then the system will generate a pdf using the populated, saved data that has been entered into the contract in conjunction with the stored template and languages selected
IF the pdf is not generated within a few seconds, the user is made aware that the pdf is loading via a loading icon

title: All subsections expand when section is selected from quickjump- edit mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ contract in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a section title for a collapsed section in QuickJump
custom_expected:
THEN system should jump the user to that section
AND the entire section and any subsections should expand

title: Contract subsections are automatically expanded when user expands high level contract section - View Mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ contract in view mode
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a section title for a collapsed section in QuickJump
custom_expected:
THEN system should jump the user to that section
AND the entire section and any subsections should expand

title: Options section toggled to 'yes'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating an MJ contract
AND user has entered Option year(s) in the General Information Section
custom_expected:
THEN Options section will toggle to Yes
AND the section will be expanded with the Add Clause button
AND options clause will not be added

title: Options section toggled to 'no'
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is creating an MJ contract
AND user has entered 0 for Option Year(s) in General Information section
custom_expected: THEN Options section will remain toggled to 'no'

title: BOC/LRD user attempts to view Payments screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/LRD user
AND user wants to view Payments screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Payments tab on a Major League Contract
custom_expected: THEN Payments screen is visible to the user

title: BOC/LRD user attempts to edit Payments screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/LRD user
AND user has permissions to edit MJ Contracts
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the Payments Screen tab
custom_expected:
THEN Payments screen is visible to the user
AND user is able to edit Payments Screen

title: Basic Club user attempts to view Payments screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in as a Basic Club user
custom_steps: WHEN the user is viewing a MJ Contract
custom_expected: THEN Payments Screen tab should not be visible to the user

title: Quick-Jump
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing an MJ Contract
AND QuickJump menu is available on the contract
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to jump instantly to any section of the contract
AND user should be able to expand and collapse contract sections

title: Allow user to cancel changes to a Professional Player Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is viewing a Professional Player Profile in edit mode
AND Cancel button is visible
custom_expected:
THEN the system should prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel
AND confirming cancellation should refresh the profile in view mode with no changes saved
AND not confirming cancellation will close the message and return user to profile in edit mode
